About Me

Hi, My name is Cameron Beiling. I'm an up and coming web developer/designer with focus on accessibility and aesthetics. I'm based out of Columbiana, Ohio, voted the nicest city in America by Reader's Digest.

How i got to where I am

I've been playing video games for as long as I can remember. There was always something I enjoyed about the challenges that would be presented within them, and being faced with obstacles that I would have to overcome. Some games had a way of pushing me to my limits and I've always enjoyed that aspect. From that passion, I've found that a lot of the things I enjoyed about video games apply to programming as well and it quickly turned into a passion.

Qualities That Help Me In This Industry

Attention To Detail

I like things to be exactly as I want them to be when I'm creating something. Meaning that the vision you share with me with how you'd like your website to be designed will be met, even on the smallest details. I take pride in my work and put in as much effort that is needed to ensure that everything is done precisely.

Tenacity

Once I'm faced with a problem, I can't give up until I've solved the problem. I don't give up on something once I have my mind set on it. That means, when it comes to providing you with an excellent service, I will always give it 100% of my effort, making sure that your website is being worked on diligently.

Studious

I've always been analytical when it comes to problem solving. Making sure to factor everything into account before trying to come up with a solution. Making it so I'm capable of overcoming any obstacle I face in my work, making the work I do effective and efficient.
